value_prop: AI-powered blockchain infrastructure untuk crypto & Web3 applications
use_case: AI assistant untuk smart contract development, NFT generation, trading analysis, dan blockchain research

tokenomics.allocation: Public Sale: 12%, Team: 15%, Ecosystem: 40%, Staking: 20%, Liquidity: 13%

team: Doxxed team dengan CEO Ilan Rakhmanov (track record di blockchain sejak 2017)
backers: Backed by DWF Labs, Polygon Ventures, Crypto.com Capital
partnerships: Partnership dengan Trust Wallet, BNB Chain, Google Cloud
roadmap: Q1 2024: AI NFT Generator, Q2: Trading Assistant, Q3: Smart Contract Auditor, Q4: Multi-chain expansion

verdict: BULLISH - Strong fundamentals dengan backing solid, real product, dan riding AI narrative yang sedang hot. Risk ada tapi manageable untuk long-term hold.
content_angle: AI yang bisa audit smart contract otomatis? ChainGPT backed by DWF Labs!
